section.title: Distribution Media

para.remark: PENDING: Distribution media for CMM 1.3 has not yet been defined.

section.para: CMM is distributed in the CMM installation package. It contains the CMM software and documentation for installing and configuring CMM in single mode and cluster mode.

The package includes:
setup.sh script for setting up the CMM installer.
Licenses subdirectory:
License files of third-party software used by CMM.
Service subdirectory:
Installation package for CMM, CMM-Service-1.3.0.tar.gz. It provides the software and setup utilities required by the Monitoring Service operator and the OpenStack operator for installing CMM in either single or cluster mode.
FJSVsvcmm-1.3.0-1.noarch.rpm , an RPM required for checking version information.
Manuals subdirectory:
PDF manuals providing an overview of CMM, as well as information directed to the application operator, the OpenStack operator, and the Monitoring Service operator.
